text: Since You Went Away is a 1944 drama movie. This movie is about life during World War II. Shirley Temple plays Bridget. Claudette Colbert plays Mrs. Anne. Jennifer Jones plays Jane. This movie was released on July 20, 1944. In 1945, the movie won the Academy Award for Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture and was nominated for 8 others. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1944 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by John Cromwell
title: Since You Went Away
